message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. This is a great deal, considering the value it will bring to your life.

Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, I am currently only able to consider offers within my budget limit of $10000. Would it be possible for you to adjust your offer accordingly?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $10000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering you the product for $11500. This is a fair compromise, considering the value it will bring to your life.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I'm still unable to meet you at $11500 due to my budget constraints. I would like to propose an offer of $10500 if that might be feasible for you.

I understand that you're still a bit short on budget, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go down to $10500. I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I'm offering you the product for $11250. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great value for the product.
